title: CHRISTIAN  RELIGIOUS STUDIES/POLITICAL SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Government, Christian Religious Studies and any other Social Science subject.
subjects: Christian Religious Studies, Government and any other subject.

title: CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES/ECONOMICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Christian Religious Studies, Economics and any other subject.
subjects: Christian Religious Studies, Economics and any other Social Science/Arts subjects.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE EDUCATION/ECONOMICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics, Physics and any other Science/Social Science subject.
subjects: Any three (3) of Economics, Mathematics/Physics and Chemistry.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE EDUCATION/MATHEMATICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any two (2) Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics and any other two (2) Science subjects.

title: SOCIAL STUDIES/CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Christian Religious Studies and any other two (2) of Economics/Commerce, Government/History, Government/Social Studies.
subjects: Christian Religious Studies and any other of History/Government, Geography, Social Studies, Economics/Commerce.

title: SOCIAL STUDIES/ECONOMICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics, Government/History and any other Social Science subject.
subjects: Economics, History/Government and any other Social Science subject.

title: SOCIAL STUDIES/POLITICAL SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Government/History and two (2) Science subjects.
subjects: Government/History and two (2) of Social Science subjects.
